readable.title: 2186087673_c7a73da7ce
readable.content: A boy is laying his head on the lap of the person who is sitting at a desk . A boy leaning against somebody on a booth seat looking under the table . A child leans on an adult 's lap while peaking underneath a table at a booth . A little boy lying down looking under a table . A view from under a table of a young boy laying in an older person 's lap .
